name: Rapid Fire
description:
unleashes a deadly barrage of hot lead causing 19 - 28 + 24% Weapon Damage and increasing your Critical Strike by 2% for each hit. Number of shots scale with Pips spent:

1 Pip: 4 shots. 
2 Pips: 8 shots.
3 Pips: 12 shots.
4 Pips: 16 shots.
5 Pips: 20 shots.
shortDescription: Attack: Pistol Shot Resets Cooldown; Expose Punish
